New Records: Nick Martinez set a franchise record with the highest strikeout-to-walk ratio (6.44) in Reds history for pitchers with 140 innings pitched
Key Match Events: Nick Martinez pitched eight innings in a complete game, resulting in a 1-0 loss to the Chicago Cubs
Post-Match Reflections: The Reds lost the game, with Martinez's performance being a key factor in the outcome
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game lasted 1 hour and 48 minutes, with wind conditions affecting play at Wrigley Field
Others: The Reds' offensive struggles and injuries contributed to the loss, with fans expressing hope for the future
